00018 #include <stdlib.h>
00019 #include "egaussian.h"
00020 #include <math.h>
00021 #include <list>
00022 #include <votca/tools/random.h>

00028 
00029 void Egaussian::Initialize(QMTopology *top, Property *options) {
00030 
00031 if (options->exists("options.egaussian.method")) {
00032     if (options->get("options.egaussian.method").as<string > () == "gaussian") {
00033         if (options->exists("options.egaussian.sigma")) {
00034             _sigma = options->get("options.egaussian.sigma").as<double>();
00035         }
00036         else {
00037             std::runtime_error("Error in egaussian: variance (sigma) of site energy distribution is not provided");
00038          }
00039 
00040         if (options->exists("options.egaussian.correlation")) {
00041             _correl = options->get("options.generate_energies.correl").as<bool>();
00042         }
00043         else {
00044             _correl = false;
00045             cout << "Warning: correlation of site energies is not specified, using non-correlated" << endl;
00046         }
00047 
00048         if (_correl) {
00049             if (options->exists("options.egaussian.cutoff")) {
00050                 _cutoff = options->get("options.generate_energies.cutoff").as<double>();
00051             }
00052             else {
00053                 //_cutoff = 1.5;
00054                 std::runtime_error("Error in egaussian: cutoff for correlations is not specified");
00055             }
00056             cout << "Generating correlated site energies with sigma = " << _sigma << " and cutoff = " << _cutoff << endl;
00057             _method = &Egaussian::AssignCorrelated;
00058         }
00059         else {
00060             cout << "Generating non-correlated site energies with sigma = " << _sigma << endl;
00061             _method = &Egaussian::AssignGaussian;
00062         }
00063     }
00064     else {
00065           if (options->get("options.egaussian.method").as<string > () == "shuffle") {
00066             cout << "Shuffling the Coulomb site energies" << endl;
00067             _method = &Egaussian::_shuffle;         
00068           }
00069     }
00070 }
00071   else {
00072       std::runtime_error("Error in egaussian: method is not specified (gaussian or shuffle)");
00073 }
00075     Random::init(14, 122, 472, 1912);
00076 }
00077 
00078 
00079 
00080 
00081 bool Egaussian::EvaluateFrame(QMTopology *top) {
00082 
00083     if (_correl) {
00084         // clear _tmp_energy to avoid accumulation of stuff
00085         // from the previous frame
00086         _tmp_energy.clear();
00087         AssignCorrelated( top );
00088     }
00089     else {   
00090         AssignGaussian( top );
00091     }
00092 
00093     return true;
00094 }
00095 
00096 bool Egaussian::AssignGaussian(QMTopology *top) {
00097 
00098     vector<QMCrgUnit *> lcharges = top->CrgUnits();
00099     vector<QMCrgUnit *>::iterator itl;
00100 
00101     for (itl = lcharges.begin(); itl!=lcharges.end(); ++itl) {
00102         (*itl)->setDouble("energy_coulomb", Random::rand_gaussian(_sigma) );
00103     }
00104     return true;  
00105 }
00106 
00107 bool Egaussian::AssignCorrelated(QMTopology *top) {
00108     // First assign gaussian energies
00109     AssignGaussian( top );
00110 
00111     // working topology = topology to do work
00112     Topology mytop;
00113     BeadList list1;
00114     NBListGrid mynbl;
00115 
00116     mytop.setBox(top->getBox());
00117 
00118     vector<QMCrgUnit *> lcharges = top->CrgUnits();
00119     vector<QMCrgUnit *>::iterator itl;
00120 
00121     for (itl = lcharges.begin(); itl!=lcharges.end(); ++itl) {
00122         // make a simple spherical bead for a new topology
00123         BeadType *tmptype = mytop.GetOrCreateBeadType("no");
00124         Bead * tmpbead = mytop.CreateBead(1, "bead", tmptype, 0, 1, 0);
00125         // position of the bead = position of the corresponding crgunit
00126         tmpbead->setPos( (*itl)->GetCom() );
00127         // additionally it stores a pointer to the corresponding crgunit
00128         tmpbead->setUserData( (*itl) );
00129         
00130     }
00131 
00132     list1.Generate(mytop, "*");
00133     mynbl.SetMatchFunction(this, &Egaussian::MyMatchingFunction);
00134     mynbl.setCutoff(_cutoff);
00135     mynbl.Generate( list1, false );
00136 
00137     for (itl = lcharges.begin(); itl!=lcharges.end(); ++itl) {
00138         // e1+e2+...+eN/ sqrt(N) - normalization to get the same sigma
00139         (*itl)->setDouble("energy_coulomb", _tmp_energy[(*itl)].getAvg() * sqrt( _tmp_energy[(*itl)].getN() ) );
00140     }
00141     return true;
00142 }
00143 
00144 bool Egaussian::_shuffle(QMTopology *top) {
00145 
00146     vector<QMCrgUnit *> lcharges = top->CrgUnits();
00147     vector<QMCrgUnit *>::iterator itl;
00148     vector<double> energies;
00149     int i_en = 0;
00150 
00151     for (itl = lcharges.begin(); itl!=lcharges.end(); ++itl) {
00152         energies.push_back( (*itl)->getDouble("energy_coulomb") );
00153     }
00154     
00155     random_shuffle ( energies.begin(), energies.end() );
00156 
00157     for (itl = lcharges.begin(); itl!=lcharges.end(); ++itl) {
00158         (*itl)->setDouble("energy_coulomb", energies[i_en] );
00159         i_en++;
00160     }
00161 
00162     return true;
00163 }
00164 
00165 
00166 bool Egaussian::MyMatchingFunction(Bead *bead1, Bead *bead2, const vec & r, const double notused) {
00167 
00168     QMCrgUnit *crg1 = bead1->getUserData<QMCrgUnit>();
00169     QMCrgUnit *crg2 = bead2->getUserData<QMCrgUnit>();
00170 
00171 
00172     double e1 = crg1->getTotalEnergy();
00173     double e2 = crg2->getTotalEnergy();
00174 
00175     _tmp_energy[crg1].Process(e2);
00176     _tmp_energy[crg2].Process(e1);
00177     
00178     return false;
00179 }
